column3: Tola a ɔyɛ Pua a n’egya nye Dodo ne ba no
column4: na ɔsoɛree bɛgyee Israel. Ɔyɛ Isakarnyi
column5: na ɔtsenaa Samir wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu."

column2: "Na odzii Israel enyim mfe eduonu ebiasa
"Na ɔno n’ekyir no Gileadnyi Jair soɛree; na odzii Israel enyim mfe eduonu ebien."
"Na ɔwɔ mbabanyin eduasa a wɔtsenatsenaa nsoasopɔnkɔmba eduasa do
column3: na wonyaa nkurow eduasa a wɔfrɛ no Havot-jair dze bodu ndɛ da yi a ɔwɔ Gilead asaase do."

column2: "Na Israelmba yɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do bio
column9: na Filistiafo enyame; na wɔpoow EWURADZE na wɔannsom no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n’ebufuw dzɛwee wɔ Israel do
"Na woyii Israelmba ahomtsew na wɔhaaw hɔn afe noara mu: mfe duawɔtwe na wɔdze haaw Israelmba a wɔwɔ Jordan egya wɔ Amorifo asaase a ɔwɔ Gilead no nyinara do."
"Na Ammonmba no botwaa Jordan dɛ wɔnye Juda
column4: na Efraim fie so rokɔko; na dɛm ntsi Israel no ho hiahiaa no dodoodow."
na Moabfo so haaw hom; na hom sui frɛɛ me
column5: na megyee hom fii hɔn nsamu."

column3: na wɔakɔsom enyame fofor: dɛm ntsi mennkɛgye hom bio."

column2: "Hom nkɔ nkosu mfrɛ enyame a hom asan mu eyiyi hɔn no; wɔmma wɔngye hom wɔ hom ahohiahia aber mu."

column3: Yɛayɛ bɔn: biribiara a oye wɔ w’enyi do no fa yɛ hɛn: ɔgye nko na yɛserɛ wo dɛ gye hɛn ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na wɔtotoow enyame ananaben no fii hɔn mu gui
column3: na wɔsoom EWURADZE: na Israel amandzehu no yɛɛ ne kra awerɛhow."
na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Gilead. Na Israelmba no poon hɔnho hyiae

column5: Ɔbarimba mmuana na obedzi kan nye Ammonmba no ako? Ɔno na wɔmma ɔnyɛ otsitsir wɔ Gileadfo nyinara do."
